%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
Minimum Enrollment and Eligibility Requirements

The employer must contribute a minimum of 50%Ptgsymbol% towards the employee’s single membership monthly payments or 50%Ptgsymbol% toward the employee’s portion of the family membership monthly payments. The employer must meet the minimum enrollment and eligibility requirements according to the applicable Anthem underwriting regulations, policies and state laws. If an employer does not meet the minimum enrollment and eligibility requirements, we reserve the right to accept this application with prior Underwriting approval. If the number of eligible Employees enrolled does not meet the underwriting guidelines in the quote Assumptions and Conditions, we reserve the right to cancel the Contract upon 30–day advance written notice.

The term “child” includes unmarried children of any age medically certified as disabled and children under 26 years old regardless of student status, marital status, financial dependency, eligibility for group sponsored insurance, eligibility as an employee under the same plan, or service in the armed forces. Children can be covered under one, but not both, parents when both parents work for the same employer and are covered under the same Anthem plan.
